name: Create
description: Allows the creation of new resources

name: Read
description: Allows reading or viewing existing resources

name: Update
description: Allows modifying existing resources

name: Delete
description: Allows removing existing resources

name: Execute
description: Allows running or executing processes or scripts

name: Manage
description: Allows overall management of a resource or system

name: List
description: Allows viewing a list or index of resources

name: Search
description: Allows performing search operations

name: Share
description: Allows sharing resources with other users

name: Invite
description: Allows inviting new users to the system

name: Assign Role
description: Allows assigning roles to users

name: Revoke Role
description: Allows removing roles from users

name: Create Policy
description: Allows creating new access policies

name: Modify Policy
description: Allows modifying existing access policies

name: Approve
description: Allows approving requests or changes

name: Reject
description: Allows rejecting requests or changes

name: Audit
description: Allows performing audit operations

name: View Logs
description: Allows viewing system or access logs

name: Create Tenant
description: Allows creating new tenants in a multi-tenant system

name: Manage Tenant
description: Allows managing existing tenants

name: Access Confidential
description: Allows access to confidential resources

name: Export
description: Allows exporting data from the system

name: Import
description: Allows importing data into the system

name: Access During Business Hours
description: Allows access only during defined business hours

name: Access From Approved Location
description: Allows access only from approved physical or network locations

name: Use Advanced Features
description: Allows use of advanced system features

name: Access Beta Features
description: Allows access to beta or unreleased features
